mapper.insert: insert into tbl_summoner (id, accountId, puuid, profileIconId, revisionDate, name, summonerLevel) values (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{puuid}, #{profileIconId}, #{revisionDate}, #{summonerName}, #{summonerLevel});

insert into tbl_match_info(match_id, game_version, game_variation, tft_set_number, game_length, game_datetime, queue_id) values (#{match_id}, #{game_version}, #{game_variation}, #{tft_set_number}, #{game_length}, #{game_datetime}, #{queue_id})
